title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 202-1.5 - Prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 202-1.5 - Prohibitions

State Regulations

No person shall conceal an emission by the use of air or
other gaseous diluents (diluting agents) to achieve compliance with an emission
standard which is based on the concentration of a contaminant in the gases
emitted through a stack. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
202-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
